website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Flex TR 8 received a lot of positive feedback from shoppers who liked its overall appearance and available color options. It was also said to be a very comfortable Nike trainer for most types of gym workouts.
pros: Almost all of the consumers commended the style and colorways of the Nike Flex TR 8
The comfort offered by the trainer exceeded the expectations of many users
According to numerous wearers, the shoe was true to size and width
Plenty of gym-goers claimed that the footgear was great for various types of workouts because it provided adequate support
The lightweight and breathable upper was lauded by a fair number of owners
Some reviewers liked that the merchandise was quite flexible
cons: A couple of individuals were dissatisfied with the mesh upper because they thought it was too thin and felt rough

customer_reviews.title: Get wide even if you have narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet but decided to get wide for the first time and what a relief! I am on my feet for 10 hours at work, and at the end of the day my feet always hurt due to swelling. I gave 4 stars because there is no arch support. After I inserted Dr. Scholl's work massaging gel insoles, they feel like walking on clouds!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow in the toe area.
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 pairs of Nike Flex 4.0. They are hard to find now and thought I would try this one as an option. They are comfortable but they are more narrow in the toe area. I wear an 8 medium, and this is my only problem with the shoe. I do cross training and outdoor walking.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Peck

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair and I love them. Took me awhile to find them because they're not the newest model anymore. I was concerned because the shipping notification showed up as a t-shirt and not shoes, but they were perfect when they came in
customer_reviews.author: CFam

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my wife. She really liked a previous version of these shoes. They fit just as expected. She really likes pattern and material on the upper.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very good fit
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes. I have plantar fasciitis, so wear half-length arch supports and with them, these are the perfect shoe. I love the color, too!
customer_reviews.author: MrsKK

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good for length but they are a little snug for width around the middle and arch of the foot. Comfortable otherwise. I'm sure the will stretch as I wear them more.
customer_reviews.author: Rachaelw_08

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I've had previous versions of this shoe and found them extremely comfortable and durable. They seem to have changed the shape of the shoe, with this version. It looks longer and is narrow across the bridge of my foot. Just not comfortable and kind of weird looking. Sending back and going to search out an earlier version. I use this for circuit training.
customer_reviews.author: SWN

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable! Great walking sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sneaker. I walk around 3 miles for work everyday comfortably and blister free !
customer_reviews.author: R.W

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Style
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Super comfortable and very stylish on. I have narrow feet so sometimes shoes can feel too wide but these fit great and provide wonderful support. They were even comfortable the whole first day that wore them! I have not done any high impact exercising in them but I am on my feet all day and these shoes have felt great.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, Sent back
customer_reviews.text: I have several pair of Nike training shoes and love them. There was something wrong with these. I couldn't get through one fitness class wearing them. They were so uncomfortable. I gave them a second try hoping I just needed to break them in. Still incredibly uncomfortable. I believe they were flawed because I do love my other Nike shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Logcabinmom

customer_reviews.title: Definite Like!
customer_reviews.text: True to size like all of my previous Nike shoes. My only dislike- it doesn’t have a loop on the back of the shoe. I think most use that loop for hanging, but I use it to put on my shoe lol. Color is awesome! (Gray and purplish blue/violet)
customer_reviews.author: JustDrea

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally narrow feet so I never have to order wide shoes. However when I tried the shoes on they were so tight on the side it was giving my feet cramps.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but narrow toe box
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe. Does seem a bit tight in the toe box and around the width of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Zwieg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe for exercising and walking will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Lois Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I wear them out at the gym and buy a new pair. I wear them for lifting and cardio at the gym!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherB

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: The insole was cut a little smaller than the inside of the shoe, but i just replaced them with gel insoles since i use these for work shoes, probably not a common thing to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Brassard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The fit was way too small. Quality not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kally

customer_reviews.title: Just like the first pair I had
customer_reviews.text: I had this exact shoe and wore them completely out. They are a couple of versions out of date so I was happy to find exactly what I wanted on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L Mathews

customer_reviews.title: They fit , and we’re comfortable right off
customer_reviews.text: I’m so thankful these shoes came so quickly , I’ve never ordered shoes online, and to my surprise they fit perfectly , now I’m out walking again, thank you
customer_reviews.author: christine nicolulis

customer_reviews.title: Fitness
customer_reviews.text: I Jazzercise and needed new shoes. I have a hard time finding my small size (5.0) and it seems I could only find it online. The shoe fits perfectly and It feels great when I do my workout. Since I jump around alot, the shoe has it great.
customer_reviews.author: Elenita V.

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with these trainers! I usually wear running shoes but really needed this type of shoe for my workouts. They fit great. Look great, even with jeans or capris!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Foster

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality “NIKE” shoes
customer_reviews.text: These now have holes in both front toes. This has never happened to me before these shoes. I t makes me wonder if they are counterfeit?
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN G.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes! They are perfect for yoga or cross-training. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable overall but narrow in toes
customer_reviews.text: Light weight nice. Maybe too narrow at the toes for most people
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: only had these about 2 months and already has a hole from my big toe rubbing the inside
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Farley

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but I needed a whole size larger than my normal size in tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Every pair of Nike I buy I always wear a size 10. These however dont fit right. Have me wondering are they real Nike
customer_reviews.author: Taunya Hicks

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Nike Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected for Nike’s narrow because wide is not offered but support is good
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Practically perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Exactly as advertised. Very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Only had them a week but I have worn them every day to work and they are comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Know if you need a wide or not!
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of my sneakers! I had to get a little bit bigger for a broken ankle!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Anderson

product_meta.title: Nike Women's W Flex Trainer 8 Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: Trainers woman Nike w Nike flex trainer 8 924339-500.
feature_bullets: Ultralight, Super-Strong Flywire Cables Integrate With The Laces For Exceptional Support As You Move From Side To Side.
Deep Grooves And A Tri-Star Pattern Allow The Sole To Flex Naturally With Your Foot. Rubber Pods In High-Wear Areas Offer Durability And Multi-Directional Traction.
Durable Mesh Provides Lightweight Breathability When Your Workout Heats Up.
Foam collar for comfort around your ankle
